page.title: 18Glenkindie Estate.
page.content: The estate house,dating from 1727,is sited in the secluded beauty of Donside.It incorporates stone work from an earier 16th Century dwelling. Approximately 20 families live & work on this estate.The absentee landowner, knows the difficulties of keeping a close relationship with the Community as did former resident Lairds.He wishes to contribute to the district as he can.The Annual Rent Court is considered a good platform for discussion between tenants & owner Its historical use was for the setting of future rents by the Laird.The landowner knows the existing way of life should not be disturbed too dramatically though the instigation of long term improvements to land & buildings must continue.By so doing he seeks to honour his obligation to his tenants & the estate.
